programme.title: Star Wars: The Last Jedi
programme.desc: After the events of Star Wars: The Force Awakens, the heroes continue their grand adventure, which reveals to them many of the mysteries of the past with regard to power.(n)

programme.title: Mission To Mars
programme.desc: When the first manned mission to Mars ends with a catastrophe, a rescue mission is launched to investigate the disaster and save any survivors.(n)

programme.title: Battleship
programme.desc: In the Hawaiian Islands, an international naval engage an intense battle against an alien species known as "The Regents". The aliens come to planet Earth to build a power source in the ocean.(n)

programme.title: Kingsman: The Secret Service
programme.desc: The story of a super-secret spy organization that recruits an unrefined but promising street kid, Harry, into the agency's ultra-competitive training program. Harry's father died when he was a child during an operation with this same organization. A global threat emerges from a twisted tech genius only to be confronted by the new recruit.(n)

programme.title: Inside Man
programme.desc: A trained gang performs a bank heist in an organized manner, and a federal agent is assigned to negotiate with them. Another agent is assigned to protect valuable assets inside a bank safe, leading to a series of negotiations from several ends.(n)

programme.title: Double Impact
programme.desc: Twin brothers, Chad and Alex, are separated from each other after their parents are killed. Chad lives with a wealthy family in Paris, while Alex is a petty crook in Hong Kong. Chad accidentally meets his brother and persuades him to join him in the search for their parents' killer.(n)

programme.title: Rabid
programme.desc: When aspiring fashion designer Rose gets into a car accident, she is left with significant scarring on her face and body. Her pursuit of stem-cell treatment is a success and she is completely transformed into a gorgeous woman. Too bad the cure makes her the source of a deadly disease as well.(n)

programme.title: Star Wars: The Last Jedi
programme.desc: After the events of Star Wars: The Force Awakens, the heroes continue their grand adventure, which reveals to them many of the mysteries of the past with regard to power.(n)

programme.title: Mission To Mars
programme.desc: When the first manned mission to Mars ends with a catastrophe, a rescue mission is launched to investigate the disaster and save any survivors.(n)

programme.title: The Heat
programme.desc: In this cop comedy, a very unlikable pair is made when the prickly FBI agent Sarah Ashburn has to team up with a crude Boston cop Shannon Mullins to track down a ruthless drug lord.(n)

programme.title: The Last King of Scotland
programme.desc: The film deals with the life of the Ugandan dictator ( Idi Amin) and his brutality from the point of view of his own physician during the 1970s.(n)

programme.title: Get Him to the Greek
programme.desc: British rock star Aldous Snow lives in a whirlwind of alcohol and drugs. When Aaron interns at a record company, his manager assigns him to get Aldous from London to Los Angeles for a concert. When he reaches London and Aldous, he finds himself in chaos and unable to get him to the concert, while Aldous postpones their trip numerous times.(n)

programme.title: When in Rome
programme.desc: Beth works at the Guggenheim and is very good at her job, so good in fact that one may say that she is perhaps a bit “too good” at it. Love and romance have been forced to take a back seat in her life as she focuses all of her energies on her career. However, all of this changes when she travels to Rome to attend her sister’s wedding and gets to know Nicholas Beamon.(n)

programme.title: Mystery Date
programme.desc: When a teenage boy falls for his beautiful neighbor, he enlists his older brother's help to win her heart, even borrowing his car to impress her. But their date takes a turn for the worse when they discover that there is a body in the trunk.(n)

programme.title: Head of State
programme.desc: Mays Gilliam is about to lose his work in his political party, when unexpectedly the presidential candidate dies and Mays gets chosen as the successor. He gets help and advise from his brother Mitch, his ex-girlfriend who came back to him in hope of becoming the first lady, as well as others including Debra his campaign advisor who is against his candidacy.(n)

programme.title: Father of the Bride
programme.desc: George (Steve Martin) and Nina (Diane Keaton) are the parents of the soon-to-be-wed daughter Annie (Kimberly Williams-Paisley). George isn't yet able to accept the idea that he will let his daughter go, while a series of comic events take place during the preparation for the wedding.(n)

programme.title: Father of the Bride Part II
programme.desc: As George struggles to accept his daughter's impending motherhood and what it says about his own role in her life, a rather unexpected dilemma further complicates his life when he discovers that his own wife is pregnant.(n)

programme.title: The Guilt Trip
programme.desc: Andy Brewster is struggling inventor about to take a road trip to sell his invention. Things take an unexpected turn when his domineering mother joins him on the journey.(n)

programme.title: What's the Worst That Could Happen?
programme.desc: As Kevin burgles businessman Max's house, the robbed becomes the robber as Max steals Kevin's lucky ring, urging him to try to get it back to save his career.(n)

programme.title: Josie and the Pussycats
programme.desc: When a music executive offers Josie and her struggling band a record deal, the band slowly discover that they've become part of a major conspiracy designed to brainwash teenagers through subliminal messages.(n)

programme.title: The Pink Panther 2
programme.desc: Inspector Jacques Clouseau (Steve Martin) returns after solving the mystery of the Pink Panther Diamond, his angry boss Dreyfus tries to keep him in minor cases, but the rare diamond is stolen again with other artifacts around the world. A team of the greatest detectives is formed to retrieve these things and Clouseau is among them.(n)

programme.title: A Beautiful Mind
programme.desc: The biography of mathematician John Forbes Nash, Jr. (Russell Crowe) since he was a university student, through his academic work and research achievements, his love story with his student Alicia (Jennifer Connelly) who became his wife and his bitter struggle with paranoid schizophrenia.(n)

programme.title: We Bought a Zoo
programme.desc: In South California, Benjamin and his family move to a new house with an adjoining zoo that needs repairs and renovations. With the help of the zoo's employees and some other people, they manage to renovate and open the zoo to the public.(n)

programme.title: Spy
programme.desc: Susan Cooper is a desk-bound CIA analyst, and the unsung hero behind the Agency's most dangerous missions. But when her partner falls off the grid and another top agent is compromised, she volunteers to go deep undercover to infiltrate the world of a deadly arms dealer, and prevent a global crisis.(n)

programme.title: Be Cool
programme.desc: Chili Palmer returns back to the music business after years of working in the movie industry, and decides to help Edie Athens, his friend's widow, revive her late husband's record company, to pay of a debt owed to a producer. Chili depends on singer and songwriter Linda Moon's talents who asks him to help her cancel her contract with Nick Carr and Raji, who quickly become Chili's enemies.(n)

programme.title: The Talented Mr. Ripley
programme.desc: Tom Ripley is sent to Italy during the late 1950s, to find the rich playboy Dickie Greenleaf. But when the mission doesn't go as planned, Tom resorts to extreme measures.(n)

programme.title: What's the Worst That Could Happen?

programme.title: The Divorce Party
programme.desc: A recently divorced man finds himself alone when he discovers that all his friends can only relate to him as a part of a married couple, until a sparkly woman convinces him to throw a glamorous divorce party to celebrate a fresh start for his life.(n)

programme.title: Into the Blue
programme.desc: Two divers are living a quiet life, but a treasure hunt gets them into trouble with a drug lord after they come upon a missing cargo in a sunken plane.(n)

programme.title: The Perfect Score
programme.desc: Hoping to get the perfect scores for their upcoming SAT exam, a group of senior students decide to hack into the Princeton Testing Center to steal the answers and secure their college places.(n)

programme.title: Along Came Polly
programme.desc: After he discovers his wife's unfaithfulness during their honeymoon, Reuben returns to the city to keep up with highly organized life, only to fall for an old friend who turns his life upside down.(n)

programme.title: The Guardian
programme.desc: Jake is a high school swim champion with a troubled past, is under training to be a coast guard at an elite school. His mentor is the legendary Ben Randall, who puts the arrogant Jake under pressure with situations that teach him about life.(n)

programme.title: Parasite
programme.desc: The life of an unemployed family living in a poor apartment changes completely when the son becomes the English tutor for the daughter of a wealthy family. As the lives of the wealthy Park family and the destitute Kim family intersect, what follows is a web of deceit and disturbing violence.(n)

programme.title: The Godfather
programme.desc: Don Vito Corleone,the head of one of the five mafia families in New York, doesn't want his younger son Michael to get involved in the life of organized crime. Michael feels the same, but things change when negotiations fail between the family of Don Corleone and other families about the distribution of drugs.(n)

programme.title: The Godfather: Part II

programme.title: Native Son
programme.desc: Bigger Thomas is a young African-American man who lives with his parents in Chicago. As he moves into the home of wealthy businessman, Henry Dalton, to become the family’s live-in chauffeur, Bigger becomes more involved in the social life of Dalton’s unorthodox daughter, Mary, and her boyfriend. It is through fear of acceptance and a feeling of shame that Bigger’s life takes a severe downturn.(n)

programme.title: Winter's Dream
programme.desc: Years after she quit skiing competitively, Kat is asked by a young competitive racer to coach her and hone her skills. Little does she know that the professional opportunity will also bring her love in the form of the racer's widowed father, Ty.(n)

programme.title: Sitting in Limbo
programme.desc: After he is wretched living in the UK for 50 years, the Jamaican-born man, Anthony Bryan, struggles during the Windrush scandal to be accepted as a British Citizen, as well as falling victim to the UK Home Office, at which he is considered an illegal immigrant and is threatened of deportation.(n)

programme.title: Truly, Madly, Sweetly
programme.desc: When a sudden inheritance brings them together, Natalie and Eric connect while renovating the historical bakery they inherited in the hope to kickstart a flourishing business. But despite their obvious feelings, Natalie remains hesitant to change their relationship from professional to romantic.(n)

programme.title: Raya and the Last Dragon
programme.desc: Years after dragons made the ultimate sacrifice to save the humans in the kingdom of Lumandra from the vicious Druun, the nefarious creatures return to threaten Lumandra, leaving the warrior Raya to embark on a quest to find the last dragon in hopes of saving her world from the Druun.(n)

programme.title: Rome in Love

But once she meets a journalist tasked with writing about the mysterious new lead of the movie, all bets are off as romance comes knocking.(n)

programme.title: Black Beauty

programme.title: Golden Gate
programme.desc: Tasked with finding communist subversives in the Chinese community in San Francisco, Kevin misuses the law to land a Chinese laundryman in prison. But when he falls in love with Marilyn, he is forced to confront the reality of his actions when he discovers that she is the laundryman's daughter.(n)

programme.title: Child's Play
programme.desc: Karen gives her son, Andy, an AI toy doll branded as "Buddi" for his birthday, which Andy calls "Chucky ". Andy starts to feel something is wrong with it, as it develops a very sinister mind of its own.(n)

programme.title: Cool Blue
programme.desc: An aspiring painter realizes that his one-night stand is the muse who could propel him to fame. But when she disappears, he sets out to find her with the help of his best friend.(n)

programme.title: Escaping the NXIVM Cult: A Mother's Fight to Save Her Daughter
programme.desc: After Catherine Oxenberg finds out that her daughter, India, has joined the NXIVM cult headed by Keith Raniere and Allison Mack, she does whatever it takes to extricate her daughter from their inflicted mental and physical abuse.(n)

programme.title: Misery
programme.desc: When the famous novelist Paul Sheldon has an accident, his life spirals out of control. Nurse Annie Wilkes takes him to her remote house, but Sheldon gradually discovers that she is an obsessed fan of his works, and she is only torturing him slowly to get him to write her stories.(n)

programme.title: Ricki and the Flash
programme.desc: Rock star Ricki (Meryl Streep), gave up everything for her dream of rock-and-roll stardom, is now returning home to make things right with her family.(n)

programme.title: Campfire Kiss
programme.desc: Dana's attempt to bond with her teenage son by taking him camping takes a turn when she clashes with the man in the cabin next to them, himself a father trying to reconnect with his daughter. But the conflict soon turns into romance as sparks fly between the two single parents.(n)

programme.title: Australia
programme.desc: Before World War II in Australia, Lady Sarah Ashley, an English Aristocrat, inherits a secluded ranch and hires Drover to prevent her new property from being taken over. While taking care of the ranch's huge herd, they are faced with attacks from the Japanese army on Darwin, Australia.(n)

programme.title: The Sun Is Also a Star
programme.desc: Natasha doesn’t think much of destiny, and miracles; she’s a true believer in science and facts. Against all odds, 12 hours before her family is deported to Jamaica, she bumps into Daniel, a nice guy whom she starts feeling like falling in love with.(n)

programme.title: Calendar Girls
programme.desc: The lives of five models turn upside down after they are selected to be the cover girls for a prestigious annual calendar. As they achieve fame overnight, they have to deal with the changes their newfound stardom brings to their lives.(n)

programme.title: Insidious: Chapter 3
programme.desc: Set before the haunting of the Lambert family, psychic Elise Rainer reluctantly agrees to use her ability to contact the dead to help a young girl who has been targeted by a supernatural entity.(n)

programme.title: Erin Brockovich
programme.desc: The true story of how down-on-her-luck single mother Erin Brokovish put together one of the biggest class actions suits in US history and won the high profile case against a multi-million dollar company despite her lack of formal education in the law.(n)

programme.title: Pretty Woman
programme.desc: In need of a woman on his arm for a social event, businessman Edward Lewis hires a young prostitute to be his escort for a week. He expects a professional who can handle herself, but what he doesn't expect is to fall in love.(n)

programme.title: Wild
programme.desc: With her life in shambles, Cheryl seeks a way out of her downward spiral by going on a solo hike on a journey of self-discovery and reevaluation of priorities.(n)

programme.title: The Hours
programme.desc: As Virginia Woolf begins writing the book Mrs Dalloway in 1923, two other women from different timelines find solace in reading the novel, as the three women struggle with depression.(n)

programme.title: You Again
programme.desc: Marni is a successful businesswoman who returns to her hometown for the marriage of her older brother. She finds that he's about to marry the girl who bullied her in high school. Things get worse when Marni's mother comes face-to-face with the girl's aunt, who was also bothering her in high school.(n)

programme.title: The Rich Man's Wife
programme.desc: José Potenza, an unhappy wife and an alcoholic, is married to Tony Potenza. Feeling upset and angry, she goes to the bar and gets to know Cole Wilson, a former criminal. When he knows her story, he suggests killing her husband in order to inherit his massive wealth.(n)

programme.title: Appetite for Love
programme.desc: When Mina's work sends her back to her hometown, she must contend with old feelings as her encounters with her former sweetheart Clay, whom she is trying to convince to sell his restaurant, stir old feelings for her.(n)

programme.title: Killer Under the Bed
programme.desc: After her father dies, Kilee moves with her mother and sister to a new city, as she struggles to adapt to her new life. Things take a turn when Kilee finds a doll riddled with pins in her backyard that she believes holds supernatural powers.(n)

programme.title: Hit and Run
programme.desc: A former gateway driver for a gang is enrolled in Witness Protection. When he gives his guard the slip in order to drive his girlfriend to an interview in LA, their field trip gets more complicated as they are pursued by a former acquaintance and a US Marshall.(n)

programme.title: The Thomas Crown Affair
programme.desc: Billionaire Thomas Crown lives a careless life in which he is bored of his work and his numerous affairs. To add thrill to his life he decides to steal a valuable painting from a museum.(n)

programme.title: Derailed
programme.desc: Charles is a married executive who meets Lucinda and has an affair with her. When a dangerous criminal named LaRoche finds out about them ,he blackmails them, turning their lives into hell.(n)

programme.title: Pet Sematary
programme.desc: A family moves into a small town,where an animal cemetery is behind the house. When the son dies from a truck accident ,the father discovers that the cemetery has power to raise the dead,so he buries his son in it hoping to bring him back to life.(n)

programme.desc: An animated family comedy that follows the daily routine of a group of animals. The distinct quality of these animals, however, is that like any human being, they have the primary instinct to want to make something out of their lives.(n)

programme.title: Ivan the Incredible (Gummi T)
programme.desc: The poor child Ivan Olsen is bullied at school, and his father doesn't make him feel special. programme.title: Kurt Turns Evil
programme.desc: Kurt discovers that society doesn't appreciate forklift operators. When he finds everyone around him has respectable jobs, he decides to turn to a life of crime and become vicious.(n)

programme.desc: Nur and her parents move to China, where she makes new friends. While they're celebrating Guo's birthday in an amusement park, they discover that their friend is missing and they have to cross a maze and go through the nine gates of the dragon to find him.(n)
